text: @Acosta Large deal. The fabric weave of most liberal media-approved cloth masks like you & Pelosi wear, protect against viruses like a fish net can catch plankton. Below is actual COVID-19 PPE. Acosta & #Democrats are not wearing it. #tcot #ccot #MAGA #KAG #WalkAway #BLEXIT #FakeNews https://t.co/xSTO0fiF7g
